traits.label: Personality Traits
value: I'm passionate about interactive storytelling. It's a big part of who I am.
I'm a lifelong learner at heart. I can never know enough.

traits.label: Ideals
value: People's actual needs should be what drives technological innovation.

traits.label: Bonds
value: I want to my work to mean something, and to make someone's day a little better.

traits.label: Flaws
value: My hyper-focus on my major tasks can lead to lapses in my ancillary responsibilities.
